title: Personal presentation skills
brief_description: This instructive video provides valuable background on how to prepare a presentation to either a large group or small gathering. Different techniques are described, demonstrated and evaluated in terms of effectiveness. Covers methods such as reading, memorising, impromptu and speaking from notes so that the viewer can gain confidence and give a successful presentation, regardless of level of experience. The underlying values of preparation, knowing your audience and recognising your own style are also outlined.
